card.name: Alternate Teal'c
card.property: Each time you assign Alternate Teal'c, gain 1 power for each Jaffa obstacle at the current mission. If at least one of the Jaffa obstacles at this mission has dominion, you may draw a card.

card.name: Cunning Queen
card.property: While Cunning Queen is assigned, other Wraith adversaries that don't already have it get Wraith vassal. Failure: Until the end of the mission, each time you pay the revive cost of a Wraith adversary, your opponent must drain an equal number of cards.

card.name: Dutiful Prior
card.property: Ori vassal. Ori adversaries assigned with Dutiful Prior get revive cost -2 (or -3 for Adria). While Dutiful Prior is assigned, complications cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Hale
card.property: While Hale is assigned to a Combat mission, you may ignore skill requirements when playing Political obstacles, and each time you play a Political obstacle, both Hale and that obstacle get Combat +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Herak
card.property: Dominion. Goa'uld vassal. While Herak is assigned, you may play Jaffa obstacles from your discard pile. If you do, each of those get: "When this card would be placed in your discard pile, purge it instead."

card.name: Hive Ship Seed
card.property: Stop Hive Ship Seed, drain 3 - Disease obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the current mission. Each time your opponent fails a mission, you may destroy Hive Ship Seed and pay 1 power. If you do, play a villain ship at no cost.

card.name: Inquisitor Prior
card.property: Each time you assign Inquisitor Prior, choose a support character. While the chosen character is assigned to the current mission, each other assigned character gets skills -1. Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

card.name: Joran
card.property: Joran gets difficulty +1 for each obstacle card in your villain score pile. After each time you revive Joran, you may take a Jaffa obstacle or a Jaffa adversary card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Khalek
card.property: Khalek gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1 for each ten cards in your opponent's discard pile. Failure: Your opponent discards their hand.

card.name: Marduk
card.property: Success or Failure: Incapacitate an assigned team character. If the mission was a success, destroy Marduk.

card.name: Ovirda
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a Combat or a Science mission, you may destroy Ovirda. If you do, that mission becomes a Culture or an Ingenuity mission (you choose which).

card.name: Primeval Queen
card.property: Primeval Queen gets difficulty +1 for each assigned support character. Failure: Your opponent may drain X, where X is equal to Primeval Queen's Ingenuity. If they do, gain X power. If they don't, incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Rhea
card.property: Stop Rhea - Look at one card from the top of your deck for each assigned team character. Take one of those cards into hand and shuffle the rest into your deck. Discard a card.

card.name: Richard Woolsey
card.property: Richard Woolsey costs power -2 to play for each failed mission this turn. Failure: For each assigned character, look at one card from the top of your mission pile, then place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Swarm Mother
card.property: Stop Swarm Mother, purge a Replicator card from your discard pile, drain 2 - Play a Replicator obstacle at no cost. Each time your opponent fails a mission, you may destroy Swarm Mother and pay 1 power. If you do, play a Replicator adversary at no cost.

card.name: Thanos
card.property: Thanos can't be blocked while the current mission is a Science mission. When you score Thanos, you may destroy a gear. If you do, gain power equal to its cost.

card.name: Tiberian
card.property: Each time you assign Tiberian, you may pay 1 power. If you do, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and places it face down at the current mission (it becomes a complication. It will be placed in its owner's discard pile when it is destroyed).

card.name: Wraith Hybrid
card.property: Dominion. Wraith vassal. Failure: You may score one additional card with dominion at the current mission.

card.name: Wraith Tracker
card.property: Wraith vassal. Each time you assign Wraith Tracker, choose one: he gets dominion until the end of the current mission; or your opponent must drain 1 for each Wraith card in your villain score pile.

card.name: Yu
card.property: While Yu is assigned, each Jaffa and/or Goa'uld obstacle at the current mission whose cost is 2 or less gets dominion.

card.name: Aiden Ford
card.property: Stop and destroy Aiden Ford, pay 2 power, drain 2 - Destroy each assigned adversary except one chosen by your opponent.

card.name: Altman
card.property: Stop a gear - Altman gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Aris Boch
card.property: To play Aris Boch, choose an adversary and place a bounty token on them. (To assign an adversary who has a bounty token, your opponent must pay 1 power. Your opponent gets: "Pay 2 power - Destroy a bounty token.") Aris Boch is blocked while the chosen.adversary has a bounty token.

card.name: Caulfield
card.property: When you play Caulfield, you may discard a card and choose another character. If you do, until the end of the current mission, she loses all her skills and gains all the current skills of the chosen character.

card.name: Dol'ok
card.property: Each time you fail a mission, you may destroy Dol'ok and discard a card. If you do, gain 1 power and, until the end of the turn, your cards consider the number of successful missions to be one higher.

card.name: Dovzhenko
card.property: When you play Dovzhenko, your opponent gains 2 power unless you stop him or unless there was a failed mission this turn.

card.name: Dreylock
card.property: Your opponent's victory total is two points higher (even While you are the villain player). To assign Dreylock, discard a card.

card.name: Hoskins
card.property: Stop Hoskins, pay 2 power - Destroy an obstacle with the dominion keyword at the current mission. Stop Hoskins - Destroy an obstacle with the withdraw keyword at the current mission. Your opponent gains power equal to its withdraw value.

card.name: Jennifer Keller
card.property: Jennifer Keller gets skills +1 while she's assigned with another character who has a glyph. Stop Jennifer Keller, discard a card - Destroy all wound tokens on a character.

card.name: Katie Brown
card.property: Each time you assign Katie Brown, you may pay 2 power. If you do, choose a character with 3 Science or more. Unblock them and, for as long as Katie Brown stays assigned, the chosen character can't become blocked.

card.name: Konstantin Nechayev
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a Political obstacle or assigns a Political adversary, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready Konstantin Nechayev. Stop Konstantin Nechayev, discard a Russian or a Political card - Play a Russian support character at no cost.

card.name: Korvyn
card.property: Success: Each assigned adversary gets revive cost +2 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Laura Michaels
card.property: Each time you assign Laura Michaels, you may have your opponent lose 1 power. If you do, destroy her at the end of the current mission.

card.name: Linda Johnson
card.property: Stop Linda Johnson - Both you and your opponent lose 1 power. If there is an assigned adversary that is either Goa'uld or Jaffa, your opponent also discards a random card.

card.name: Loran
card.property: Stop Loran, pay 2 power - Remove the failure text on a Goa'uld or a Disease obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Morozov
card.property: When you play Morozov, you may destroy him. If you do, destroy a prepared ambush obstacle and, until the end of the turn, your cards consider the number of failed missions to be one higher.

card.name: Orlov
card.property: Orlov is blocked during the first mission played each turn. Each time your opponent plays an obstacle or adversary with the dominion keyword, gain 1 power.

card.name: Rak'nor
card.property: Success: Choose a non-adversary card in your opponent's villain score pile and place it in its owner's discard pile. If the chosen card is Jaffa, gain 1 power.

card.name: Sarnouk
card.property: Sarnouk gets skills +1 while there is at least one non-adversary card in your opponent's villain score pile.

card.name: Sofiya Kaminskaya
card.property: When you play Sofiya Kaminskaya, if there was a failed mission this turn, you may stop her. If you do, choose one: Ready a stopped character; or stop an incapacitated character (they are no longer incapacitated).

card.name: Teal'c
card.property: While Teal'c is ready, each time you play a support character, you may draw a card.

card.name: Vala Mal Doran
card.property: Pay 4 power, discard a card - Ready Vala Mal Doran. You can do this only once each turn. This ability costs power -1 to activate for each ready gear.

card.name: Zaddik
card.property: Failure: You may destroy Zaddik. If you do, place a lore token on an assigned team character. That lore token's glyph must be the same as the current mission's glyph.

card.name: Amelia Banks
card.property: Gemini or Orion. During your power phase and your mission phase, each time you resolve an ability or effect that changes the order of the cards in your mission pile, gain 1 power.

card.name: Bill Lee
card.property: Each time you assign Bill Lee, for each glyph he has, reveal one random card from your deck. Bill Lee gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission for each hero card revealed, and your opponent gains 1 power for each villain card revealed. Shuffle the revealed cards back into your deck.

card.name: Camile Wray
card.property: Grit. Gemini: At the end of your power phase, gain 1 power and draw a card. Orion: At the end of your power phase, gain 1 power and draw a card. Gemini and Orion: Each time Camile Wray uses grit, gain 1 power and draw a card.

card.name: Dana Scully
card.property: Libra or Orion: Dana Scully gets Combat +1, or Combat +2 instead if she's assigned with Fox Mulder. Gemini and Orion: Obstacles cost power +1 to play for each Science obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Devon
card.property: Gemini or Libra: At the end of your power phase, gain 1 power. Libra: At the end of your power phase, gain 1 power for each adversary.

card.name: Fox Mulder
card.property: Grit. Gemini or Orion: Fox Mulder gets Science +1, or Science +2 instead if he's assigned with Dana Scully. Libra and Orion, Discard a hero card, pay 1 power - Unblock Fox Mulder.

card.name: Garshaw
card.property: Orion: Assigned adversaries can't contribute more than 2 difficulty to missions. (If their difficulty is 3 or more, it's considered to be 2 instead.) Orion and Scorpius: Obstacles can't contribute more than 2 difficulty to missions.

card.name: Grigori Bogdanov
card.property: Libra or Scorpius: Grigori Bogdanov gets: "Failure: You may look at one card from the top of your mission pile for each failed mission this turn. If you do, place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile."

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Grit.

card.name: Ka'lel
card.property: Gemini or Triangulum: Ka'lel gets skills +1 for each successful mission this turn or each different glyph she has, whichever is lower.

card.name: Martin Kennedy
card.property: Libra or Scorpius: Martin Kennedy gets experience +1 for each promotion token he has. (A team character can have any number of promotion tokens. He gets point value +1 for each such token, to a maximum point value of 6.)

card.name: Nikolai Vostrikov
card.property: Gemini or Orion: Nikolai Vostrikov gets: "Failure: You may destroy an assigned Russian support character. If you do, your other Russian characters get skills +1 until the end of the turn. You can do this only once each turn."

card.name: Reynolds
card.property: Orion or Pisces: Reynolds gets: "Failure: Place the current mission on the top or bottom of your mission pile. (It isn't counted as a failed mission)" Orion and Pisces: Reynolds gets: "Failure: You may pay 3 power. If you do, ready an SGC team character.

card.name: Ronald Greer
card.property: Grit. To assign an adversary while Ronald Greer is assigned, your opponent pays 1 power for each different glyph he has. Scorpius or Triangulum: Ronald Greer gets Combat +1 and Ingenuity +1.

card.name: Rya'c
card.property: Gemini or Scorpius: Rya'c gets Culture +1 and Combat +1. Pisces: Complications cost power +1 to play while Rya'c is assigned. Triangulum: Rya'c gets skills +1 while an adversary is assigned.

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Each time you assign Samantha Carter to a mission that has a glyph matching one of hers, you may pay 1 power. If you do, ready a support character.

card.name: Stan Kovacek
card.property: Triangulum, Stop Stan Kovacek, pay 3 power - Destroy a Political obstacle. Triangulum and Triangulum: Each time you activate Stan Kovacek's first ability, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready him.

card.name: The Lone Gunmen
card.property: The Lone Gunmen get skills -1 while they are assigned. Stop The Lone Gunmen, discard X cards (X must be equal to the number of obstacles at the current mission) - Draw X cards. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Walter Skinner
card.property: Gemini or Libra: Other X-Files team characters assigned with Walter Skinner get Culture +1. Orion: Each time your opponent plays an obstacle, you may pay 1 power. If you do, your opponent loses 1 power (or 2 power if the obstacle is Political).

card.name: Yat'Yir
card.property: Scorpius: Yat'Yir gets Culture +1 and point value +1. Triangulum: Yat'Yir gets Combat +1 and point value +1. Scorpius and Triangulum: Yat'Yir gets Ingenuity +1 and grit.

card.name: Brothers in Arms
card.property: Choose a team character. They get skills +1 for each different affiliation trait other assigned team characters have that they don't, until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Full-Automatic Fire
card.property: To play this event, block a ready character with 1 Combat or more from the current mission. Wound an adversary X times, where X is equal to the blocked character's Combat. Until the end of the turn, these wound tokens can't be destroyed.

card.name: The Gift of Life
card.property: If there is a ready or assigned Wraith adversary, this event costs power -2 to play and your opponent gains 2 power when you play it. Ready an incapacitated character (they are no longer incapacitated).

card.name: Momentous DIscovery
card.property: To play this event, stop a character with either 2 Culture or more or 2 Science or more. The current mission gets: "Success: place a lore token on an assigned character."

card.name: Spycraft
card.property: To play this event, stop a character. If your opponent has three or more cards in their villain score pile, they must choose one they own among them to take into hand (or to place on top of their deck if the stopped character is Tok'ra).

card.name: Stopgap Fix
card.property: Choose one: Move a gear attachment from one character to another: or take a gear card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Android Assembly Bay
card.property: Pay 3 power - Choose a skill. Until the end of the current mission, this card becomes a support character with 2 in the chosen skill and no game text. (It's no longer a gear.)

card.name: Eurondan Stasis Chamber
card.property: Stop this gear - Choose a ready support character with a "when you play (this character)" triggered effect. Resolve that effect as if that character had just been played (other costs must be paid as normal), then destroy him.

card.name: Foxtrot Class Submarine
card.property: Each time you fail a mission, you may destroy this gear. if you do, choose one: You may play a gear or a support character at no cost; or you may play a support character from your discard pile at no cost.

card.name: Licensed Card Game
card.property: Stop this gear, predict to your opponent whether the top card of your deck costs more, the same, or less than the top card of their deck, then drain 1 - Your opponent must drain 1. If you predicted correctly, gain 2 power. If you didn't, your opponent gains 2 power.

card.name: Rebel Jaffa Camp
card.property: Stop this gear and a team character - Play a support character as normal, except they cost power -1 to play (or power -2 to play if both the stopped and the played characters are Jaffa).

card.name: Stargate Shield
card.property: While this gear is ready, each time an ambush obstacle would become prepared, it is destroyed instead, unless your opponent pays 1 power. Stop this gear, pay 2 power - Remove the failure text from an obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Air Strike
card.property: Outlaw. Victory: The current mission gets difficulty +1 for each assigned villain ship.

card.name: At Oberoth's Mercy
card.property: This card may be used to boost any Replicator adversary. Failure: Place this obstacle beneath an adversary. They get "While this adversary is assigned, obstacles that share at least one affiliation trait with them cost power -1 to play, but can't cost less than 1 power."

card.name: Borrowed Strength
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a Wraith adversary. They get difficulty +2 until the end of the current mission. Success or Failure: At the start of your next turn (as the hero player), wound a ready team character twice.

card.name: Callous Counterstrike
card.property: When you play this obstacle, for each obstacle card in your villain score pile, your opponent destroys a support character.

card.name: Contingency Plans
card.property: Each time you play an obstacle with a "when you play this obstacle" triggered effect, you may destroy Contingency Plans. If you do, that obstacle's triggered effect resolves one additional time.

card.name: Eyes of the Goa'uld
card.property: Victory: You may score an assigned Goa'uld ship (place it in your villain score pile).

card.name: Flagisallus
card.property: Success: If this card is an obstacle, it permanently becomes a support character with: "When you assign Flagisallus, at the end of the current mission, destroy it." (It is now a hero card and loses the obstacle trait.)

card.name: Forced Evolution
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They are blocked. Success: The chosen character gets skills +2 until the end of the turn. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Ghastly Warning
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character. They are blocked. Failure: Stop all characters.

card.name: Hathor's Resurrection
card.property: This card may be used to boost any Goa'uld adversary. Failure: Place this obstacle beneath an adversary. They get revive cost -5.

card.name: Hostage Negotiations
card.property: Failure: Choose an affiliation trait on a character. Destroy each support character who does not have the chosen affiliation trait.

card.name: IOA Investigation
card.property: This card may be used to boost any Political adversary. Failure: Place this obstacle beneath an adversary. They get "Each time you assign this adversary, your opponent loses 2 power and you gain 2 power."

card.name: Jaffa Elite Troops
card.property: Dominion. Failure: If a Jaffa adversary is assigned, you may score one additional card with dominion at the current mission.

card.name: Massive Gravity Well
card.property: To play this obstacle, pay X power. When you play this obstacle, stop each ship with firepower X or lower.

card.name: Message In A Bottle
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may stop an assigned character. If they don't, this obstacle gets: "Failure: Incapacitate each assigned team character."

card.name: Nanite Infection
card.property: Each time a support character would become stopped, destroy them instead. Success: Destroy this obstacle.

card.name: Organizational Overhaul
card.property: To play this obstacle, you must ready an assigned adversary. When you play this obstacle, you may assign a different adversary. If you do, they get difficulty +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: The Orici
card.property: Failure: You may search your deck for an adversary card and play it from there at no cost, then shuffle your deck. If that adversary costs 5 power or more, your opponent gains 1 power.

card.name: The Quest
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle beneath an adversary. They get Culture +1, Science +1, Combat +1, and Ingenuity +1.

card.name: Quid Pro Quo
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may stop an assigned character. If they don't, this obstacle gets withdraw 4.

card.name: Ravaging Renewal
card.property: This card may be used to boost any Wraith adversary. Failure: Place this obstacle beneath an adversary. They get "Each time you assign this adversary, your opponent must drain 4, then you may ready each other stopped adversary."

card.name: Severe Dehydration
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose one: Destroy a stopped support character; or incapacitate a stopped team character.

card.name: Social Experiment
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready each assigned team character. Your opponent can't assign more than two team characters to this mission.

card.name: Stun Bubble
card.property: When you play this obstacle, for each assigned team character, choose a support character. They are blocked.

card.name: Sudden Resignation
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose one: Destroy a gear card attached to a character; or destroy a promotion token or a lore token on a character.

card.name: Surrender or Die!
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may destroy a support character. If they don't, this obstacle gets difficulty +2.

card.name: Tense Standoff
card.property: Dominion. Failure: Stop a support character. You may prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat/Ingenuity): Gain 1 power for each Replicator card in your villain score pile.

card.name: Test of Might
card.property: This card may be used to boost any Jaffa adversary. Failure: Place this obstacle beneath an adversary. They get "Each time you assign this adversary, you may destroy a support character."

card.name: Unstoppable Advance
card.property: Each time you assign a villain ship, you may pay 1 power. If you do, play a complication at no cost. Victory: Ready a villain ship.

card.name: The Will of the Ori
card.property: This card may be used to boost any Ori adversary. Failure: Place this obstacle beneath an adversary. They get "When you score this adversary, incapacitate a team character."

card.name: Wraith Reinforcements
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a Wraith adversary to get Wraith vassal until the end of the current mission. Failure: You may pay power equal to the chosen adversary's cost. If you do, they get dominion until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Za'tarc Self-Destruct
card.property: Failure: Choose an assigned team character. Destroy each non-glyph attachment they have and each token on them, then incapacitate them.

card.name: Flagisallus
card.property: When you assign Flagisallus, at the end of the current mission, destroy it. This card can't be included in decks.
